mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drones.COMMENTS (USER_ID, PROJECT_ID, COMMENT) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{projectId}, #{comment} )
mapper.sql:
SELECT C.ID AS COMMENT_ID, C.USER_ID AS COMMENT_USER_ID, C.PROJECT_ID AS COMMENT_PROJECT_ID, C.COMMENT AS COMMENT_COMMENT, C.MODIFIED_AT AS COMMENT_MODIFIED_AT, C.CREATED_AT AS COMMENT_CREATED_AT,
U.ID AS USER_ID, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.PHOTO_URL AS USER_PHOTO_URL, U.INTRODUCTION AS USER_INTRODUCTION, U.SUMMARY AS USER_SUMMARY, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT,
G.ID AS GROUP_ID, G.NAME AS GROUP_NAME, G.ROLE AS GROUP_ROLE, G.MODIFIED_AT AS GROUP_MODIFIED_AT, G.CREATED_AT AS GROUP_CREATED_AT FROM drones.COMMENTS C LEFT JOIN drones.USERS U ON U.ID = C.USER_ID LEFT JOIN drones.USER_GROUPS UG ON UG.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN drones.GROUPS G ON G.ID = UG.GROUP_ID
